entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Risk of freezing rain late this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow with risk of freezing rain. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022
